 2012-15852012-11-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Marking Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the FIREARMS MARKING REGULATIONS in order communicate that the existing Firearms Marking Regulations under the Firearms Act, scheduled to COME INTO FORCE on December 1, 2012, are being deferred.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0251 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
